text: Aaron Spelling (April 22, 1923 - June 23, 2006) was an American executive producer of many television shows. He was born in Dallas, Texas. His shows included Beverly Hills, 90210 and Melrose Place. Spelling was diagnosed with oral cancer in 2001. He died of a stroke in Holmby Hills, Los Angeles, California. Spelling had a daughter, Tori, and son, Randy. == Other websites == * Category:1923 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Actors from Dallas Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:Deaths from stroke Category:People with Alzheimer's disease Category:Writers from Texas
title: Aaron Spelling
